com.github.wuic.engine
Interface SpriteProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
CGAbstractSpriteProvider, CGCssSpriteProvider, CGJavascriptSpriteProvider
public interface SpriteProvider

This interface represents a type of object which provides sprite generation capabilities.

When a set of images is aggregated, then the region of each of them in the generated image is located through a sprite. A sprite could be generated according to specific convention in a chosen language. The implementation of this interface must be able to specify the language through a known NutType.

Since:
0.2.0
Version:
1.4
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Method Detail

addRegion

void addRegion(Region region,
               String name)

Registers a new region in the image.

Parameters:
region - the region
name - the region name

getSprite

Nut getSprite(String url,
              String workflowId,
              String nutNamePrefix,
              List<Nut> originals)
              throws StreamException

Get the sprite of all the added images in a map associating a NutType as key a Nut as value.

Each sprite is in a path associated to a supported NutType which helps to determinate the language used to represent them.

Parameters:
url - of the final image
workflowId - the workflow ID
nutNamePrefix - the prefix to append to the sprite nut name
originals - the original nuts
Returns:
a nut representing the sprite path
Throws:
StreamException - if an I/O error occurs while aggregating images

init

void init(String imageName)

Initializes this provider with a new image. Previous regions will be cleared.

Parameters:
imageName - the new image name
